summary: The FDA Modernization Act 3.0 (S. 355) mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the FDA Commissioner, to publish an interim final rule within a year. This rule will replace references to animal testing in existing regulations with nonclinical testing methods, as per amendments from the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2023. It also specifies the addition of a definition of "nonclinical test" to several sections of title 21 of the Code of Federal Regulations and includes a technical amendment to section 505 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
